page.title: 15Knowsley Hall Survey
page.content: On Friday 27th June a group from Nine Trees School went to interview the Estates Manager at Knowsley Hall. Here are some of the 34 questions and replies: "We think that some of the land from the estate was sold for houses. Can you tell us of this? {"Before the war people decided that {more people should live in the country {so they moved there." "In what way has the land changed in the area of Knowsley village?" {"It depends on the people and the {number of buildings. There has to be {a balance." His answers helped us in our survey of the estate land that came into our sector. He also took us around the Hall which the Earl of Derby does not live in any more. Carol Dunn and Lesley Johnson
